overview: A 20-minute workout to amp you up.  Need a jolt of energy?  Feel the rush with Zumba star trainers Kass Martin and Loretta Bates in this fast-paced, 20-minute workout designed to reach an endorphin release-zone and bring you back invigorated!  Whether you're tight on time or need a quick pick-me-up, this workout will give you a rush that lasts all day.
title: Zumba Fitness: Rush
